title: Joel Kim Booster On Why Fire Island Is "A Safe Haven For Queer People"
description:
Joel Kim Booster, the writer and star of the new film, "Fire Island," made his first visit to The Late Show this week and explained what makes a small patch of land off New York's Long Island such a special place for LGBTQ people. "Fire Island" is streaming now on Hulu.
